name: SpaceBreak 2046
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Today is the day that you finally have a chance of breaking out of this dreaded space prison. Dont waste it! Use scraps that you find to craft some makeshift weapons that you will need to use to kill the bosses that will try and prevent your escape. 

Submission to Boss Rush Game Jam 2023.

Made Completly by Nick Mushong

Controls - 

A/D - move left and right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Scroll Whell - Switch Guns

Tab - Pause
